markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Martial Disciple](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=24)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 63 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

You dedicated yourself to intense training and rigorous study to become a great warrior. The school you attended might have been a traditionalist monastery, an elite military academy, or the local branch of a prestigious mercenary organization.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Dexterity, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in your choice of either the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)
 or the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, as well as the [Warfare Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain a skill feat: [Cat Fall](/Feats.aspx?ID=765) if you chose [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Quick Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=825) if you chose [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3).
name: Martial Disciple

summary_markdown: You dedicated yourself to intense training and rigorous study to become a great warrior. The school you attended might have been a traditionalist …
text: Martial Disciple Source Core Rulebook pg. 63 4.0 You dedicated yourself to intense training and rigorous study to become a great warrior. The school you attended might have been a traditionalist monastery, an elite military academy, or the local branch of a prestigious mercenary organization. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Dexterity, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in your choice of either the Acrobatics or the Athletics skill, as well as the Warfare Lore skill. You gain a skill feat: Cat Fall if you chose Acrobatics or Quick Jump if you chose Athletics.
